function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambiguity and lack of understanding about the virus strain, behavior, and transmission","Impact":"Incorrect or ineffective measures to control the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Invest in research and collaboration to gain a better understanding of the virus; promote transparent data sharing and communication about the virus","Technologies":"Big data analytics and AI for pattern recognition and data analysis","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Centralization and analysis of unstructured or disorganized data","Impact":"Missed insights and incorrect conclusions leading to ineffective management of the crisis","Mitigation":"Implement data standardization and integration processes; use big data analytics and AI for data analysis and pattern recognition","Technologies":"Data management systems, big data analytics, AI","People":"Data scientists, analysts, public health organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, technology companies"},{"Description":"Dependence on early adoption of AI and cognitive tools","Impact":"Reliance on technologies that may not be fully effective or accurate in analyzing and predicting disease spread","Mitigation":"Continuously validate the accuracy and effectiveness of the AI and cognitive tools; invest in ongoing research and development of these technologies","Technologies":"AI, machine learning, continuous validation techniques","People":"Government officials, decision-makers, technology experts","Owner":"Government agencies, private firms, technology companies"}]}
